export const loadState=()=>{try{const serializedState=localStorage.getItem("cfstate");if(serializedState===null){return undefined;}return JSON.parse(serializedState);}catch(err){return undefined;}};export const saveState=state=>{try{const serializedState=JSON.stringify(state);localStorage.setItem("cfstate",serializedState);}catch{// ignore write errors
}};
